ch0102_90_bell/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s so nice to see you again!
ch0102_90_bell/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re looking for someone to battle, I’d be
happy to be your opponent... Hehe!
ch0102_90_bell/7101_0701_01_10:
Keeping a winning streak going is really hard,
no matter who you are.
ch0102_90_bell/7101_0701_02_10: The same goes for Neo Champions, too.
ch0102_90_bell/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s why it’s important to work super hard, so
you don’t slip up at a crucial moment.
ch0102_90_bell/7102_0701_01_10: You don’t need to be good at a bunch of stuff.
ch0102_90_bell/7102_0701_02_10:
Having even just one thing you can pride yourself
on is more than enough!
ch0102_90_bell/7102_0701_03_10: Try to always value your own talents, OK?
ch0102_90_bell/7103_0701_01_10:
There’s a legend that says Virizion fought to
protect its friends.
ch0102_90_bell/7103_0701_02_10: That’s so courageous and cool, don’t you think?
ch0102_90_bell/7103_0701_03_10:
I better muster up all my courage so that I can
protect someone when I battle, too!
ch0102_90_bell/7104_0701_01_10: There’s a lot of legends about Virizion.
ch0102_90_bell/7104_0701_02_10:
Even so, we still don’t know much about its
biology.
ch0102_90_bell/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s why I want to do some research on it and
share my knowledge with others—especially since
I’m its partner!
ch0102_90_bell/7104_0701_04_10:
Doing things like that is part of a Neo Champion’s
job, don’t you think?
ch0102_90_bell/7105_0701_01_10: I didn’t become a Neo Champion all by myself.
ch0102_90_bell/7105_0701_02_10:
I managed it thanks to you and all the others
who supported me!
ch0102_90_bell/7105_0701_03_10:
I know I’m your senior, but I still depend on you
a lot! I hope you and I can stay close!
ch0102_90_bell/1701_0701_01_10: I want to give you something! Here, take it!
ch0102_90_bell/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m always cheering for you because you work
soooo hard!
ch0102_90_bell/2501_0701_01_10:
Even though I managed to become a Neo
Champion, I’m still not as strong as Cheren or
Hilbert when it comes to battling.
ch0102_90_bell/2501_0701_02_10:
Still, I do have my own experience that I can make
use of.
ch0102_90_bell/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’m going to try my best and use it to
become a role model for others!
ch0102_90_bell/2501_0702_01_10:
Cheren and Hilbert are who they are, and I am
who I am. Bearing that in mind helps me relax
a little.
ch0102_90_bell/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s important to want to outdo your rivals, but a
person shouldn’t push themselves TOO hard,
you know?
ch0102_90_bell/2511_0701_01_10:
The day I set off on my journey with Cheren
and Hilbert...
ch0102_90_bell/2511_0701_02_10:
I aspired to become my ideal self—a stronger
me.
ch0102_90_bell/2511_0701_03_10: I wonder if I’ve managed to do that... Hehe.
ch0102_90_bell/2511_0702_01_10:
You can’t just make yourself stronger in an instant.
You have to do it slowly but surely, one step at a
time.
ch0102_90_bell/2511_0702_02_10:
By doing that, then maybe one day, you’ll discover
a different you!
ch0102_90_bell/3001_0701_01_10:
Our first step in the morning is the most important
part of the day! Don’t be afraid—let’s go!
ch0102_90_bell/3003_0701_01_10:
When you’re tired from adventuring, take a break!
Don’t push too hard, but keep going!
ch0102_90_bell/3005_0701_01_10:
Quiet nights are the perfect time to take a good
look at yourself and reflect.
